授業目的: This course prepares students for research leading to completion of graduation thesis writing requirements in the final year.
到達目標: Students will learn to do independent research in relation to their graduation theses.

トピック.授業計画1: Each class will consist of presentation and discussion.
トピック.授業外学習2: There will be weekly readings and reports in class.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.

name: 【400】Research Seminar II　３／Research Seminar II [EN]
担当者: ツー　ティモシー（TSU TIMOTHY YUN HUI）
